name: LONGEYED PROJ. (Wadish the creator)
description:
I don't know... They haven't contacted me in a week.. I'm scared, I took the test and went to open the door but there was no one there... This program. It's just hell, it shouldn't exist... They're coming for me, I know it. I'm posting this tutorial here... but go through it at your own risk...

[GAME DESCRIPTION]

You will find out what and who "LONGEYED" is. You will be taught how to distinguish them and you will pass an exam test... who knows what it will cost for you.

[HOW TO PLAY]

listen & pray.
